import{useEffect}from'react';/**
 ** useKeyPress
 ** @param {string} key - the name of the key to respond to, compared against event.key
 ** @param {function} action - the action to perform on key press
 **/export default function useKeypress(key,action){useEffect(function(){function onKeyup(e){if(e.key===key)action();}window.addEventListener('keyup',onKeyup);return function(){return window.removeEventListener('keyup',onKeyup);};},[action,key]);}
